Configuration.Name: L1=L2=4_offset_apx10_JM2017
Configuration.SetupScript:
# config.wavelength = 5 # config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 # config.det = 3200 # config.det_offset = 300 # config.srce = 180 # config.guide = 'g7' # config.apx = -72 # config.bs = 2 # config.beamcenterx = 33.37 # config.beamcenterz = 94.89 # config.drive()
driveAtt(330) # !!! Warning: it is not recommended to manually drive the attenuator sics.drive('nvs_lambda', 5.0) sics.set('/instrument/velocity_selector/wavelength', 5.0) sics.set('/instrument/velocity_selector/wavelength_spread', 0.1) driveDet(3200, 300) driveEntRotAp(180) driveGuide('g7') sics.drive('apx', -72) selBs(2) sics.set('beamcenterx', 33.37) sics.set('beamcenterz', 94.89)
